Metrics/MethodLength.Description: Avoid methods longer than 30 lines of code.

Style/CaseEquality.Description: Avoid explicit use of the case equality operator(===).

Lint/ElseLayout.Description: Check for odd code arrangement in an else block.

Style/IfWithSemicolon.Description: Do not use if x; .... Use the ternary operator instead.

Style/VariableInterpolation.Description: Don't interpolate global, instance and class variables directly in strings.

Lint/Loop.Description: Use Kernel#loop with break rather than begin/end/until or begin/end/while for post-loop tests.

Style/BeginBlock.Description: Avoid the use of BEGIN blocks.

Metrics/AbcSize.Description: A calculated magnitude based on number of assignments, branches, and conditions.

Style/WhileUntilModifier.Description: Favor modifier while/until usage when you have a single-line body.

Style/FormatString.Description: Enforce the use of Kernel#sprintf, Kernel#format or String#%.

Metrics/ModuleLength.Description: Avoid modules longer than 250 lines of code.

Style/For.Description: Checks use of for or each in multiline loops.

Style/EmptyLinesAroundMethodBody.Description: Keeps track of empty lines around method bodies.

Lint/ConditionPosition.Description: Checks for condition placed in a confusing position relative to the keyword.

Style/DotPosition.Description: Checks the position of the dot in multi-line method calls.

Style/BlockEndNewline.Description: Put end statement of multiline block on its own line.

Style/UnlessElse.Description: Do not use unless with else. Rewrite these with the positive case first.

Lint/InvalidCharacterLiteral.Description: Checks for invalid character literals with a non-escaped whitespace character.

Style/TrailingUnderscoreVariable.Description: Checks for the usage of unneeded trailing underscores at the end of parallel variable assignment.

Metrics/ParameterLists.Description: Avoid parameter lists longer than three or four parameters.

Style/SpaceInsideStringInterpolation.Description: Checks for padding/surrounding spaces inside string interpolation.

Style/RedundantException.Description: Checks for an obsolete RuntimeException argument in raise/fail.

Style/EmptyLinesAroundAccessModifier.Description: Keep blank lines around access modifiers.

Style/PercentQLiterals.Description: Checks if uses of %Q/%q match the configured preference.

Lint/Eval.Description: The use of eval represents a serious security risk.

Style/WhileUntilDo.Description: Checks for redundant do after while or until.

Lint/DefEndAlignment.Description: Align ends corresponding to defs correctly.

Style/BlockDelimiters.Description: Avoid using {...} for multi-line blocks (multiline chaining is always ugly). Prefer {...} over do...end for single-line blocks.

Style/TrailingCommaInLiteral.Description: Checks for trailing comma in literals.

Style/SymbolProc.Description: Use symbols as procs instead of blocks when possible.

Lint/ParenthesesAsGroupedExpression.Description: Checks for method calls with a space before the opening parenthesis.

Style/MultilineOperationIndentation.Description: Checks indentation of binary operations that span more than one line.

Style/ClassMethods.Description: Use self when defining module/class methods.

Style/ClassAndModuleChildren.Description: Checks style of children classes and modules.

Style/FileName.Description: Use snake_case for source file names.

Style/ClosingParenthesisIndentation.Description: Checks the indentation of hanging closing parentheses.

Lint/FormatParameterMismatch.Description: The number of parameters to format/sprint must match the fields.

Lint/UnneededDisable.Description: Checks for rubocop:disable comments that can be removed. Note: this cop is not disabled when disabling all cops. It must be explicitly disabled.

Style/IfUnlessModifier.Description: Favor modifier if/unless usage when you have a single-line body.

Style/SpaceBeforeFirstArg.Description: Checks that exactly one space is used between a method name and the first argument for method calls without parentheses.

Lint/EnsureReturn.Description: Do not use return in an ensure block.

Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVariable.Description: Do not use the same name as outer local variable for block arguments or block local variables.

Style/ClassVars.Description: Avoid the use of class variables.

Lint/UnderscorePrefixedVariableName.Description: Do not use prefix `_` for a variable that is used.

Style/EndBlock.Description: Avoid the use of END blocks.

Style/RedundantReturn.Description: Don't use return where it's not required.

Style/EmptyLinesAroundClassBody.Description: Keeps track of empty lines around class bodies.

Style/Semicolon.Description: Don't use semicolons to terminate expressions.

Metrics/ClassLength.Description: Avoid classes longer than 250 lines of code.

Lint/LiteralInCondition.Description: Checks of literals used in conditions.

Style/SingleLineBlockParams.Description: Enforces the names of some block params.

Style/UnneededPercentQ.Description: Checks for %q/%Q when single quotes or double quotes would do.

Style/NegatedWhile.Description: Favor until over while for negative conditions.

Style/OneLineConditional.Description: Favor the ternary operator(?:) over if/then/else/end constructs.

Lint/UselessSetterCall.Description: Checks for useless setter call to a local variable.

Style/RaiseArgs.Description: Checks the arguments passed to raise/fail.

Style/TrivialAccessors.Description: Prefer attr_* methods to trivial readers/writers.

Style/SpaceAroundEqualsInParameterDefaul.Description: Checks that the equals signs in parameter default assignments have or don't have surrounding space depending on configuration.

Style/RedundantBegin.Description: Don't use begin blocks when they are not needed.

Style/SpaceBeforeComment.Description: Checks for missing space between code and a comment on the same line.

Style/SpaceInsideBlockBraces.Description: Checks that block braces have or don't have surrounding space. For blocks taking parameters, checks that the left brace has or doesn't have trailing space.

Style/PredicateName.Description: Check the names of predicate methods.

Style/DoubleNegation.Description: Checks for uses of double negation (!!).

Style/IndentHash.Description: Checks the indentation of the first key in a hash literal.

Style/ColonMethodCall.Description: Do not use :: for method call.

Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition.Description: Don't use parentheses around the condition of an if/unless/while.

Lint/UselessComparison.Description: Checks for comparison of something with itself.

Style/EmptyLines.Description: Don't use several empty lines in a row.

Style/BarePercentLiterals.Description: Checks if usage of %() or %Q() matches configuration.

Rails/TimeZone.Description: Checks the correct usage of time zone aware methods.

Lint/RequireParentheses.Description: Use parentheses in the method call to avoid confusion about precedence.

Style/BracesAroundHashParameters.Description: Enforce braces style around hash parameters.

Lint/EndInMethod.Description: END blocks should not be placed inside method definitions.

Style/SpaceAfterMethodName.Description: Do not put a space between a method name and the opening parenthesis in a method definition.

Style/OpMethod.Description: When defining binary operators, name the argument other.

Style/SelfAssignment.Description: Checks for places where self-assignment shorthand should have been used.

Rails/Output.Description: Checks for calls to puts, print, etc.

Style/InitialIndentation.Description: Checks the indentation of the first non-blank non-comment line in a file.

Lint/NestedMethodDefinition.Description: Do not use nested method definitions.

Lint/AmbiguousOperator.Description: Checks for ambiguous operators in the first argument of a method invocation without parentheses.

Style/SymbolLiteral.Description: Use plain symbols instead of string symbols when possible.

Style/AccessorMethodName.Description: Check the naming of accessor methods for get_/set_.

Lint/UselessAssignment.Description: Checks for useless assignment to a local variable.

Style/SpaceAroundBlockParameters.Description: Checks the spacing inside and after block parameters pipes.

Style/TrailingBlankLines.Description: Checks trailing blank lines and final newline.

Rails/ScopeArgs.Description: Checks the arguments of ActiveRecord scopes.

Style/GuardClause.Description: Check for conditionals that can be replaced with guard clauses

Style/DefWithParentheses.Description: Use def with parentheses when there are arguments.

Style/UnneededCapitalW.Description: Checks for %W when interpolation is not needed.

Style/MethodDefParentheses.Description: Checks if the method definitions have or don't have parentheses.

Style/VariableName.Description: Use the configured style when naming variables.

Style/NegatedIf.Description: Favor unless over if for negative conditions (or control flow or).

Style/EvenOdd.Description: Favor the use of Fixnum#even? && Fixnum#odd?

Style/MultilineBlockLayout.Description: Ensures newlines after multiline block do statements.

Performance/Size.Description: Use `size` instead of `count` for counting the number of elements in `Array` and `Hash`.

Rails/ActionFilter.Description: Enforces consistent use of action filter methods.

Style/AlignArray.Description: Align the elements of an array literal if they span more than one line.

Style/NestedTernaryOperator.Description: Use one expression per branch in a ternary operator.

Lint/LiteralInInterpolation.Description: Checks for literals used in interpolation.

Style/AsciiComments.Description: Use only ascii symbols in comments.

Style/MethodCallParentheses.Description: Do not use parentheses for method calls with no arguments.

Style/WhenThen.Description: Use when x then ... for one-line cases.

Style/RescueModifier.Description: Avoid using rescue in its modifier form.

Style/ModuleFunction.Description: Checks for usage of `extend self` in modules.

Style/MultilineTernaryOperator.Description: Avoid multi-line ?: (the ternary operator); use if/unless instead.

Performance/StringReplacement.Description: Use `tr` instead of `gsub` when you are replacing the same number of characters. Use `delete` instead of `gsub` when you are deleting characters.

Style/Lambda.Description: Use the new lambda literal syntax for single-line blocks.

Style/IndentArray.Description: Checks the indentation of the first element in an array literal.

Style/StringLiteralsInInterpolation.Description: Checks if uses of quotes inside expressions in interpolated strings match the configured preference.

Lint/DeprecatedClassMethods.Description: Check for deprecated class method calls.

Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.Description: A complexity metric that is strongly correlated to the number of test cases needed to validate a method.

Style/SpaceAfterNot.Description: Tracks redundant space after the ! operator.

Style/ClassAndModuleCamelCase.Description: Use CamelCase for classes and modules.

Lint/NonLocalExitFromIterator.Description: Do not use return in iterator to cause non-local exit.

Style/SpaceAroundOperators.Description: Use a single space around operators.

Lint/CircularArgumentReference.Description: Don't refer to the keyword argument in the default value.

Style/AccessModifierIndentation.Description: Check indentation of private/protected visibility modifiers.

Style/AlignParameters.Description: Align the parameters of a method call if they span more than one line.

Lint/EachWithObjectArgument.Description: Check for immutable argument given to each_with_object.

Style/EmptyLinesAroundBlockBody.Description: Keeps track of empty lines around block bodies.

Style/SpaceBeforeBlockBraces.Description: Checks that the left block brace has or doesn't have space before it.

Style/TrailingCommaInArguments.Description: Checks for trailing comma in parameter lists.

Style/WordArray.Description: Use %w or %W for arrays of words.

Style/AsciiIdentifiers.Description: Use only ascii symbols in identifiers.

Style/CharacterLiteral.Description: Checks for uses of character literals.

Rails/ReadWriteAttribute.Description: Checks for read_attribute(:attr) and write_attribute(:attr, val).

Style/DeprecatedHashMethods.Description: Checks for use of deprecated Hash methods.

Style/HashSyntax.Description: Prefer Ruby 1.9 hash syntax { a: 1, b: 2 } over 1.8 syntax { :a => 1, :b => 2 }.

Style/StringLiterals.Description: Checks if uses of quotes match the configured preference.

Style/AlignHash.Description: Align the elements of a hash literal if they span more than one line.

Style/OptionalArguments.Description: Checks for optional arguments that do not appear at the end of the argument list

Style/SpaceInsideHashLiteralBraces.Description: Use spaces inside hash literal braces - or don't.

Lint/AmbiguousRegexpLiteral.Description: Checks for ambiguous regexp literals in the first argument of a method invocation without parenthesis.

Metrics/PerceivedComplexity.Description: A complexity metric geared towards measuring complexity for a human reader.

Style/LeadingCommentSpace.Description: Comments should start with a space.

Rails/Date.Description: Checks the correct usage of date aware methods, such as Date.today, Date.current etc.

Style/NumericLiterals.Description: Add underscores to large numeric literals to improve their readability.

Style/SignalException.Description: Checks for proper usage of fail and raise.

Style/FirstParameterIndentation.Description: Checks the indentation of the first parameter in a method call.

Lint/StringConversionInInterpolation.Description: Checks for Object#to_s usage in string interpolation.

Style/CaseIndentation.Description: Indentation of when in a case/when/[else/]end.

Style/ParallelAssignment.Description: Check for simple usages of parallel assignment. It will only warn when the number of variables matches on both sides of the assignment. This also provides performance benefits

Style/LineEndConcatenation.Description: Use \ instead of + or << to concatenate two string literals at line end.

Style/Next.Description: Use `next` to skip iteration instead of a condition at the end.

Style/EmptyLinesAroundModuleBody.Description: Keeps track of empty lines around module bodies.

Style/RedundantSelf.Description: Don't use self where it's not needed.

Style/MultilineIfThen.Description: Do not use then for multi-line if/unless.

Lint/Void.Description: Possible use of operator/literal/variable in void context.

Style/MethodName.Description: Use the configured style when naming methods.
